data.actual_result: It is pushed downwards due to the line break and then looks messy
data.short_description: When editing current payment details the state/province/region box isn't aligned with the other boxes [Outside US country specific] [Firefox]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on Firefox - Open the billing tab - Be in a country outside of the US - Edit current payment details - Observe the state/province/region box
